data.text: @thomas_boon There's a lot of flying going on in this particular destination of yours... is it in Europe?
@GGarbincius We think we will need extra emojis, Gedas! https://t.co/pSRzOUs3YS
@simonech Love this destination! And Italians have won everything there is to won this year - Eurovision, EUROs... https://t.co/qIpaXZePFF
@bi11p Thailand! A fabulous destination! 🇹🇭😍
@jackjcampagna ⏱️We will add the clock emoji here as well! 🇨🇭
@buljonS Whoops, a different continent, although our gut wanted to say Africa at first! Hope you will enjoy your journey there!
@edzins616 There should be a specific shashlik emoji as well! 🇬🇪
@buljonS 🇹🇭 or 🇮🇳? As in both of these there are elephants, coconuts and perfect weather! 😁
@buljonS Is this Asian country?
@bonjorman We cannot wait for you to see and enjoy Latvia! 🇱🇻😊
@ParaTr00per Additional emojis, pleaaase! 😇

@Amtmanis Let's turn on the news on TV, shall we? The answer should be right there! 🙃
Canary Islands is the correct answer!
@reevesyk1 You missed the eagle emoji! https://t.co/OJrng1kQZK

@AZvejsalnieks Such pain... if left on the floor during the night... 😢
Denmark and Billund! 🇩🇰
@6AD1996 Huh, that bear emoji was a total giveaway and we missed it! Shame, shame, shame! Now we know the right answer - Russia! 🐻
@6AD1996 Is this country located in the Scandinavian region?
@nickknock0 Will this be Latvian football @kajbumba team #11vilki? Because if not, we will need more emojis, Nick!
@vitavitola Those will be our brothers across south of the border - 🇱🇹
@ilzearklina Are you thinking FRENCH fries with the last emoji, Ilze? 🤔😄
@viktorsevaldin Is this the saying for "Cheers!" in the particular country? 😁 https://t.co/1BpROshd1B
@Fr_Ascaso You made it really easy for us, but this doesn't change that this country is indeed fabulous - Greece!
@jw1601 Netherlands! 🇳🇱😊
@eeyou https://t.co/3T5GWmM8TE
@ALarins Japan! 🇯🇵 https://t.co/rtSB5AAGaH
@Vaivodz Catania?🤔 https://t.co/fAtXFyKMjT
@LindaVeidemane Well then this changes things completely! Malta! Wonderful destination and island!
@LindaVeidemane We have some guesses however we are not quite sure yet - may we ask for some additional emojis? 😇
@Vaivodz Erupting volcano emoji would hint us for a very specific island, however that pizza then quite doesn't fit in there. Well, we will go for it anyway - could this be La Palma?
@viez USA! USA! https://t.co/UO1EwgXpqr
@artauma This should be Italy, right?

data.text: @JarlathHealy We would also like to emphasize the safety of your data - your tweet with the picture contains sensitive details about your booking such as booking reference, passenger names and route. We always remind not to post such data publicly online for your own safety.

@JarlathHealy Hi! As said in our website, if you wish to cancel your booking and there are less than 72 hours left until scheduled departure of your flight we kindly invite to contact our Call centre. As there was a no-show from your side, tax refund is being offered. Thank you! https://t.co/07gneQNsEf

@aurelijaippo Hello! Just skip the document check in that case (as system currently accepts only EU issued certificates) and continue with the regular registration process. Your documents will be checked at the airport upon request. Thank you!

November Baltic Outlook available on board! This issue will introduce you to Dubai and its impressiveness - what started as a village of pearl divers has grown into a cosmopolitan metropolis, leaving travelers a lasting impression. 
🐪🌴 Read also online: https://t.co/zknxwLNQ02 https://t.co/JefvPVbjMQ

urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text: @annszi Hi! Due to operational reasons as well as expected low demand, flights to/from Budapest are currently expected to be resumed on March 2022! However, there still can be some schedule adjustments! Do follow us and check our webpage https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg from time to time! 😉

data.text:
Thank you for participating! Because the majority was right, we’re starting to believe we have more aviation geeks following us than we initially thought🥰
The other abbreviation for Riga Airport is indeed EVRA!

@niknais_kaamis Labdien! Atvainojamies par bagāžas aizkavēšanos. Darīsim visu, lai tā pēc iespējas ātrāk pie Jums atgrieztos. Ja esat aizpildījis visas nepieciešamās formas, ziņojot par bagāžas aizkavēšanos, informējam, ka tās statusam varat sekot šeit: https://t.co/mBbcJbQ0XX
@thebookbug Please know that customers can contact us via direct messages even in cases when both accounts are not following each other. But sure, we just gave you a follow 😉

@thebookbug Hello! Thanks for your question. We kindly advise to share more details of your reservation (for example, your booking reference number) with us in a private message. We'll take a look. Thank you!
@goingfinn Hello Chris! At most airports you can start dropping off your baggage 2 hours before your scheduled departure.
@barblanquito For further assistance we can advise to contact our Reservations department via reservations@airbaltic.com

@barblanquito Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. If you have filled a cancellation request online or contacted our Reservations department directly via email, we are sure they will get back to you as soon as your request has been reviewed. Thank you!

But… what is the other abbreviation (airport code) widely used in aviation for this airport? 🛬

data.text: ❗️ Please be aware that airBaltic has received reports of its name is being used in fraudulent survey e-mails. This is NOT an official airBaltic email - both e-mail address and button leads to a phishing site. Please DO NOT click nor provide any personal or card information. https://t.co/8UoQvFStms

Nevari izlemt - #Mājsēde vai #Tālsēde? Šis palīdzēs 😉
✈️ Meklē tiešos lidojumus no Rīgas un pārlaid rudeni droši un saulaini: https://t.co/OkQQzHR1UQ https://t.co/jOdLwwcDFP
@jfvilleda @nayibbukele 😥

We're celebrating 26 years of airBaltic, and we've brought presents! 🎁Shake your phone once a day and win airBaltic Club points, flight e-vouchers and a flight for two to any airBaltic destination: https://t.co/eG5U3Lo1Dy https://t.co/GHV5FJU6uc

Nomaini mājsēdi pret tālsēdi - izvēlies rudeni pavadīt saulaināk!☀️Attālinātais darbs un mācības ir īstais brīdis nomainīt ierasto vidi pret ko eksotiskāku. Šobrīd tiešie lidojumi no Rīgas pieejami par neatvairāmām cenām: https://t.co/OkQQzHR1UQ https://t.co/oXlCAuNxqd

@Pattie_Twinkle Hello! Currently we are not expecting any major changes to our flight schedule due to newly imposed restrictions in Latvia. However if there will be any individual changes to some flights in particular, all affected passengers will be informed about it. Thank you!
@EEEmilZZZ @BTC_Archive Wonderful! Fingers crossed for the fifth one in the close future!

data.text:
@EEEmilZZZ @BTC_Archive Indeed, @EEEmilZZZ is right! 🤓
https://t.co/Jdu69F3ZVc
@bradzj Thanks for your kind words, Bradley! Stay safe and hopefully see you on board some time in the future!
Runway to new adventures and experiences. We are ready to welcome you on board! https://t.co/LAnRT6kVQX

@Baumerts Labdien! Šobrīd nekādas problēmas ar mājaslapas darbību novērojuši neesam. Vai varam lūgt DM ziņā atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas par reisiem, ko cenšaties iegādāties, kā arī problēmām (kļūdas ekrānšāviņi) ar ko saskarieties? Paldies.
@mimistae Such reviews warm our heart! Thank you and stay safe!
#DidYouKnow that this autumn already the tenth group (consisting of thirteen students) began their professional pilot studies at the Pilot Academy? https://t.co/86oGXGhUuR
@mimistae Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. Please check your direct messages. We have provided you with an answer there. :) Thank you.

data.text: @ClareOHanlon1 @agathe_the_book Please DM us privately more details as well as booking reference number, we will check the status!

data.text: @agathe_the_book Hello! We kindly ask you to contact our Reservations department in this case, our team will advise on the possible options in this situation: https://t.co/UWa844vRzD

@swaart Hello! Currently we are not planning any impact on our transit operations. However if there will be any individual changes to some flights in particular all the affected passengers will be informed about this. Thanks for your understanding!

Thank you for participating! Majority got it right - many of you were visiting Rhodes! ☀️ It was our top destination this summer season and we are excited to see what the next year brings! Have a great week!

@PucekaInese Labdien! Tikām informēti, ka pašapkalpošanās bagāžas aparāti lidostā strādā bez problēmām, pieļaujam, ka kāds individuāls tehnisks sarežģījums, atvainojamies par to. Šādās situācijās aicinām kontaktēties ar mūsu check-in galdiņu aģentiem.

data.text: @NLsmalst @Europarl_NL Hi! Sorry you have not been satisfied with our service. Please note that assigned seating is for additional charge if you have purchased our cheapest GREEN class ticket. If you are okay with a seat assigned by the system, just continue the registration process. Thank you.

We're honored to announce that today airBaltic received a Livonia Award from Prime Minister of Estonia @kajakallas and Prime Minister of Latvia @krisjaniskarins for being the most successful Latvian company in Estonia: https://t.co/PzCpXeUahR https://t.co/ugKXEvvspV

data.text:
Another Friday, another #airBalticQuiz! Looking back at our summer season, we can only reminisce about all those happy, tan and well rested people on board with us! ☀️ 
There were so many sunny destinations that people enjoyed, but which of these was the most popular? 🏖

airBaltic goes for 100% mandatory vaccination for all employees by November 15: https://t.co/82LuD8pXhK The health and safety of our employees and passengers is our top priority. https://t.co/ccf79nfmSc

data.text: With the help of eased travel restrictions and attractive leisure destinations, we have tripled our passenger numbers in September 2021. Last month we carried 232 900 passengers – that's 194% more than during the same period last year. Read more: https://t.co/XhLxuD4kNC https://t.co/Q6ZqHAJXmQ

14. oktobrī plkst. 13.00 airBaltic neklātienē organizē atvērto durvju dienu, ļaujot interesentiem iepazīties ar stjuarta vakanci. Uzņēmums aicina pievienoties tiešsaistes atlases pasākumam visus interesentus, kuri ir motivēti uzsākt darbu kā stjuarti: https://t.co/JrsEubblBh https://t.co/bMIYynpzlR

@btisdall Hello, once again! May we kindly ask you to share more details in regards to this (such as e-mail address used for registration) via private message? Our Technical team is currently looking into the said issue. Thank you.

data.text: For our birthday, airBaltic Pilot Academy performed a unique training flight drawing 26 across the sky and marked the legacy of aviation we will continue going forward. We're incredibly grateful to each of our employees and passengers. Let's fly towards new adventures together!✈️ https://t.co/AUqijXuXAP
@btisdall Hello! Thanks for your message. We will pass this information on to our colleagues from technical department! :) Thank you.
@PuthyEater1377 Thank you! 🥳️💚

Did you catch that on @flightradar24? 👀✈️ airBaltic Pilot Academy performed a special training flight for our birthday drawing the number 26 across the sky! We're excited to see what the future holds and ready to continue our legacy going forward. Here's to 26! 🎉 https://t.co/E19Q87cbar
@ervins @flightradar24 It surely is! 😏✈️

@drareg59 😎
